result.title: MindCoding 4th Round 2017
result.content:
Hello,

We have some good news. This time 13 will turn into a lucky number meant to bring generous prizes to those wo are passionate about algorithms, because MindCoding's last online round will take place on Thursday, April 13th. So all you need to do is enjoy another 90 minutes of coding on our platform and compete for gaining a valuable new experience or fight for your place during the final 2 rounds which will take place between 28th-30th of April 2017 in Cluj-Napoca, Romania. This round will also consist of 4 problems of scores ranging between 100 and 1000 which will decrease in time. Pay attention to the friendly reminders which will be displayed with the problem set when the contest runs. They are usually suggesting you not to open all problems at once because you might lose points. The chances are still in your hand if you want to fight for your spot in the finals, so don't be discuraged about missing the previous rounds. Your prestation can lead to unexpectedly successfull results and take you to Cluj-Napoca for the on-site MindCoding contests.

We are happy to remind you about this year's prizes

MindCoding team

Cosmin Rusu (cr.rusucosmin) — project coordinator

Sergiu Pușcaș (Sergiu)

Marius Gavrilescu (mgv) — the creator of our platform

Gabriel Ineluș (gabrielinelus)

Bianca Costin (o_mic)

Casian Marc (marccasiannicolae)

Alexandru Ionita (juve45)

Camelia Hanes (gcatdrey)

Bereczki Norbert (bnorbertcristian)

George Linut (Browser007)

Alexandru Vasiu (alex.vasiu)

More details about the time and date of the contest in your region can be found on our online platform (https://mindcoding.ro/). We encourage you to use the facilities provided and practice problems, make sure you have an account and pay attention to problem statements. Moreover, during the contest you can find us on our mailing list, which is available on our site. During the contest we will be there to answer all your question regarding possible misunderstandings in problem statements or anything else that might occur. Our facebook page is open for you to join our community and keep up to date for future events and contests that we will organize ( https://www.facebook.com/mindcodingcluj/ ).

On 13th of April, you'll have to give your ultimate best, in order to get the chance to come to Cluj during 28th-30th of April and battle for the worthy prizes!

We are looking forward to meeting you here and wish you a high score

See you in the finals,

MindCoding team
